1. Ask for a task schedule.<br>
    Better come up with a schedule first to ask a staff if it is reasonable.<br>
    Because it may be difficult for staff to answer.<br>
    If it is feasible, go for it. If not, staff can explain and argue.<br>
    This is more balanced I think.<br>
